main event: Two witnesses observed a bright light moving rapidly over Lake Michigan at Ogden Dunes, Indiana on September 25, 1951.
interesting points: The object was described as elongated in shape with no apparent tail,The light was observed to be approximately 2,000 feet high,The sighting lasted for about 1 minute,The witnesses were civilians,An earlier report from 1952 mentions another unidentified phenomenon observed by Mr. J.M.W.
